aWLI_StateProvision.content: {\rtf1\fbidis\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1036{\fonttbl{\f0\fswiss\fprq2\fcharset0 Calibri;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Calibri;}{\f2\fnil\fcharset0 Arial;}{\f3\fnil\fcharset0 Arial,Bold;}{\f4\fnil MS Sans Serif;}} {\colortbl ;\red0\green0\blue0;} \viewkind4\uc1\pard\ltrpar\sl276\slmult1\lang1033\f0\fs22 The Company will pay for direct physical loss of or damage to covered property at the\par premises described in the Declarations caused by or resulting from any cause of loss or\par damage covered under this form. \par \par \cf1\b\f1 I. PROPERTY COVERED\cf0\b0\f0\par \cf1\b\f1 PERSONAL PROPERTY OF THE INSURED\cf0\b0\f0 : Business personal property owned by the insured\par and usual to the occupancy of the insured, including the insured\rquote s interest in personal\par property owned by others to the extent of the value of labor, materials and charges furnished,\par performed or incurred by the insured; all while (1) in or on the building(s) or (2) in the open\par (including within vehicles) on or within 100 feet of the designated premises.\par \par \cf1\b\f1 II. PROPERTY NOT COVERED\cf0\b0\f0\par \cf1\b\f1 THIS POLICY DOES NOT COVER:\cf0\b0\f0\par \pard\ltrpar A. \f2\fs20 Accounts, bills, currency, food stamps or other evidences of debt, money, notes or securities. Lottery tickets held for sale are not securities;\f0\fs22\par B. \f2\fs20 Animals, unless owned by others and\par boarded by you, or if owned by you, only as\par "stock" while inside of buildings;\par \b\f3 C. \b0\f2 Automobiles held for sale;\par \b\f3 D. \b0\f2 Bridges, roadways, walks, patios or other\par paved surfaces;\par \b\f3 E. \b0\f2 Contraband, or property in the course of\par illegal transportation or trade;\par \b\f3 F. \b0\f2 The cost of excavations, grading, backfilling\par or filling;\f0\fs22\par \cf1\lang1036\f4\fs16\par }
aWLI_StateProvision.Title: Apartment Building-Property Coverage Form
aWLI_StateProvision.Name: Apartment Building-Property Coverage Form
